name: TalkRemilia
_source: speak;Remilia;Ahh~ I feel in my element this night.
speak;Reimu;I guess that's to be expected from a vampire.
speak;Remilia;I almost wish Sakuya and the others were here to enjoy this night with me.
speak;Reimu;Tsk. Having them here would've made our jobs easier.
speak;Remilia;Can't blame me for wanting something different.
speak;Reimu;Really? And how are you holding up with not having someone at your beck and call?
